front.title: RTCP XR Report Block for TS Decodability Statistics Metric reporting

abstract.t: Transport Stream is a standard container format used in the transmission and storage of multimedia data. Unicast/Multicast/ Broadcast MPEG-TS over RTP is widely adopted in the IPTV deployment. This document defines an RTCP XR Report Block that allows the reporting of decodability statistics metrics related to transmissions of MPEG-TS over RTP.
